title: Rebirth
description: (Rebirth is a republication of Ravin Tija Maurice's debut novel)In the span of a blink everything can change.......Katrine only ever had thoughts of a normal life. As was custom, she would learn the ways of being a woman from her mother, Anastasia, so she could be a good wife and mother. One day, in the fall of 1610, Katrine is innocently sent out into their village to collect some flour, setting in motion a chain of events that would turn her world upside down. Tearing her away from her mother, three witches bring forth Katrine's true nature and uncover a secret hidden from her family for generations. Discovering she descends from a bloodline steeped in intrigue, Katrine fights to survive the deadly urges handed down from her Grandmother, Countess Elizabeth (Erzsebet) Bathory.
author: Ravin Tija Maurice
